comments.author: Stephane Lo Presti.7258
comments.body:
Hi everyone,

Please note that from now on, we’re suggesting that you report all errors and bugs related to the API in this stickied thread:
https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/community/api/API-errors-bugs/

Thank you.

comments.author: foldor.1067
comments.body:
There are various items which are missing from the API. An example would be
https://api.guildwars2.com/v1/item_details.json?item_id=23042

That should be Journeyman’s Salvage Kit, but instead it gives an error.

There are others, but I don’t have the ID’s handy at the moment. There are a handful of them that are in the https://api.guildwars2.com/v1/items.json list, but which don’t give a result.
